title: Photograph, View of the chancel and main altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of the chancel and main altar of an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Main altar under a painting of Christ with the Elders, with a canopy over it and a canopied statue of an archangel at either side. The crucifix under a canopy at the center of a reredos of turrets and gablets; an urn at either end. Statue of the Virgin, left.

Same church as 1961-83-7 & -9.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View of the chancel and main altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-8
